input.sentences: the restaurant is very modernly designed with basic colors and sharp edges to the decor .
the modern design lends itself to an almost futuristic design .
the natural coffee beans are the main source of the restaurant 's success .
the low lighting in the place gives the artwork almost a glow .
the coffee beans are dried and roasted prior to using them .
output.sentences: Giovanni was dressed impeccably sharp to attend a private gathering at a restaurant that was modernly decorated.
The modern decor lends a futuristic flare to the experience.
The gathering was a huge success highlighted by the waiter's presentation of its coffee source exclusively provided to the restaurant.
The low illumination of the lighting made the furniture glow.
The smell of the roasted coffee made Giovanni think of all his prior dinning extravaganzas and he appreciated the way the coffee beans were dried.
